Logan.Bridgerland Applied Technology College: Bridgerland Technical College is a post-secondary educational institution located in Logan, Utah. It is a campus of the Utah College of Applied Technology system, and provides several courses designed to train students interested in a particular career field. The main campuses are located in Logan, with two satellite campuses: the Brigham City campus, located in Box Elder County; and the Rich County campus, located in Woodruff, Utah.
